photo.desc: Rainy day views from Goat Mountain

divs.text: Long ago there were four brothers who went hunting mountain goat.
As it began to rain they set up their camp on the ledge of a cliff and went to sleep.
Woken by the flash of lightening and the sound of thunder, they saw supernatural beings dancing from mountain top to mountain top on rainbows, smashing quartz crystals in their hands.
The three younger brothers wanted to steal the crystals for their own use, but were killed by the heat when they got too close.
The eldest brother cut a hole in his blanket and watched these supernatural beings dance.

divs.caption: Cathedral mountain in the clouds, looking NE from the Peak of Goat Mountain.

divs.text:
The next day he returned to his village, carved a mask, and taught the people the dance of Thunder.

- Clyde Tallio
